description: Erection of rear dormer roof extension and installation of 3no. rooflights to front roofslope
decision_conditions: The proposed erection of rear dormer roof extension and installation of 3no. rooflights to front roofslope falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B & Class C of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The assessment of this application is based on measurements taken from the submitted drawings / plans. If it transpires that the drawings / plans submitted are incorrect this would nullify the validity of this decision and you are advised to submit a fresh application with the correct information / drawings.

The fee has been calculated according to the proposed floor area.The fee required for your planning application is £ 1,734.00. We acknowledge the receipt of £578.00, please pay the outstanding balance of £1,156.00  Payment can be made online via the Kingston council website, via our Contact Centre on 020 8547 5002,
